1.title: Return of the Guapos Part 2

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

1.plot: Peabody and Sherman continue to make things right on their journey to stop an unlikely band of outlaws unleashed by the Guapos.

2.title: Return of the Guapos Part 3

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

2.plot: After the Guapos steal their show, Peabody and Sherman must track down 3 historical bandits running amuck in NYC.

3.title: Magic Hiccups/Gaius Maecenas

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

3.plot: Sherman accidentally swallows Sweet Tune's magic flute and gets a case of magical hiccups, creating complete chaos on the show.

4.title: Sherman's Tooth/Voyager Gold Record

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

4.plot: When Sherman wants to pull his loose tooth for Tooth Fairy cash, Peabody brings a historical dentist on the show. Sherman's fear causes problems.

5.title: Gone Comic Gone/Harry Houdini

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

5.plot: Shermanâ€TMs comic goes missing and it's up to Peabody to find out who took it and why...

6.title: P-Bro/First Canine Police Force

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

6.plot: Agammemnon brings his band of brothers back from ancient Greece. Peabody and Sherman help history's first canine police force catch a gaseous criminal.

7.title: Cheerleaders/Mansa Musa

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

7.plot: Sherman enters a cheer leading competition, but his attempts to get a newly formed squad ready disrupts Peabodyâ€TMs show about famous historical diseases.

8.title: Bring Your Kids to Work Day/Leif Erikson

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

8.plot: It's Bring Your Kids to Work Day but when the kids act up on the show, the parents must lay down the law...until the adults' parents come on the show.

9.title: Orchopti-NOT-ron/Mulan

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

9.plot: Super fan Maria Garcia hosts the show when Peabody and Sherman get trapped inside Orchoptitron. Christine's meddling threatens to derail Mulan's destiny.

10.title: The Show's the Thing/Peter Cooper

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

10.plot: Famed playwright William Shakespeare refuses to cast Peabody in his dream role. Inventor Peter Cooper injects a little too much life into his gelatin.

11.title: Peabody's Delivery/Joe vs. The Peabody and Sherman

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

11.plot: An important package distracts Mr. Peabody from his Australia-themed show. Peabody meets the sausage maker that inspired him to invent the WABAC.

12.title: Seen It/Edgar Alan Poe

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

12.plot: When an audience heckler calls out the show for having a stale formula, Peabody mixes things up and has disastrous results.

13.title: The Perfect Perfect Show Again Again/Abraham Lincoln

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

13.plot: Peabody and Sherman celebrate historical lasts but their guests get lost in NYC, so Peabody must continue the show without the neighbors creating chaos.

1.title: The Perfect Show/Napoleon

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

1.plot: Peabody and Sherman's first show goes off the rails when their celebrity-crazed neighbors won't leave. Napoleon throws a temper tantrum over dessert.

2.title: Stuck/Mozart

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

2.plot: Peabody tries to play an Irish jig while trapped in the elevator. Mozart blows his big piano audition and lands everyone in jail.

3.title: Sherman's Pet/Marco Polo

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

3.plot: Sherman begs Peabody to keep a woolly mammoth as his pet. Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges and discovers spaghetti.

4.title: Handcuffs for a Song/Wright Brothers

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

4.plot: Christine won't release Peabody from handcuffs until he lets her sing. The Wright brothers must get their plane back from a flock of angry birds.

5.title: New Sponsor/Cleopatra

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

5.plot: Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show. Beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

6.title: Black Hole/Winston Churchill

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

6.plot: Peabody and Sherman accidentally create a black hole after skipping their chores. Winston Churchill hides in a baby nursery to avoid work.

7.title: Big Boy/Blackbeard

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

7.plot: Sherman brings back a giant man-baby after he loses a neighbor's son in the WABAC. Blackbeard battles a bully pirate to get his mojo and beard back.

8.title: Biggest Fan/Queen Isabella

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

8.plot: Shelby, Peabody and Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show. Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

9.plot: Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit. Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

11.plot: Christine tries to impress her twin sister by pretending to host the show and marry Peabody. Lady Godiva hides in a cake and joins a drum circle.

12.plot: Sherman lets Mr. Hobson ride Captain Cools to beat Joan of Arc in a jousting competition. John Sutter creates a pig rush to discover the gold rush.

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

13.plot: Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu that's turning everyone blue. Zeus's Titans face off against a gawky geek squad.

1.title: The Wrath of Hughes

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

1.plot: Peabody and Sherman confront bizarro versions of themselves after entering an alternate reality that's ruled by a cyborg Mrs. Hughes.

2.title: Jump the Whale Shark/Frédéric Bartholdi

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

2.plot: A beachy-keen Sherman squashes a rival by jumping the shark. Famed sculptor Frédéric Bartholdi learns to stand up to his overbearing mother.

3.title: Pea Dummy/Mary Anning

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

3.plot: After scoring surprisingly low on an IQ test, a time-traveling Peabody meets his match in brainy Mary Anning, history's first female paleontologist.

4.title: Climate Control/Ziryab

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

4.plot: Our hot-and-cold co-hosts come to blows over the temperature in the studio. Distracted designer Ziryab unveils his vision for a royal wedding.

5.title: Brain Switch/Koikawa Harumachi

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

5.plot: Everything's off-kilter when Peabody and Sherman attempt to swap brains. Comic book inventor Koikawa Harumachi unleashes a literary monster.

6.title: Super Sherman/Ada Lovelace

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

6.plot: Sherman gains unexplained superpowers when a meteorite hits the penthouse. Messy Math whiz Ada Lovelace writes the code for the world's first computer.

7.title: Mouse Hunt/David Bushnell

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

7.plot: A mouse on the loose in the penthouse makes Peabody's skin crawl. The inventor of the world's first submarine sets out to find a sea monster.

8.title: Sweet Little Lies/Allan Pinkerton

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

8.plot: Peabody vows to teach Sherman that honesty is the best policy. Pioneering private eye Allan Pinkerton searches for a stash of stolen diamonds.

9.title: Tree House/Queen Hatshepsut

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

9.plot: A visit from Johnny Appleseed turns the studio into a woodsy wonderland. Self-absorbed pharaoh Hatshepsut opens up the world's first zoo.

10.title: This Is Your Life?/Robert Peary

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

10.plot: Peabody and Sherman help Hobson cross items off his bucket list. Explorer Robert Peary's historic North Pole trek takes a detour to Santa's workshop.

11.title: Telethon/Enrico Caruso

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

11.plot: Sherman hosts a telethon to help his school, and win a video game. / After the great San Francisco earthquake, Peabody and Sherman attempt to prove opera star Enrico Caruso's innocence.

12.title: Spooktacular/Nicolas-Joseph Cugnot

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

12.plot: A spook-tacular show turns Peabody and Sherman into monsters. The inventor of the world's first automobile is also one of the world's worst drivers.

13.title: Return of the Guapos/Lucy Walker

episode of.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show (TV Series 2015–2017)

13.plot: The Guapo Brothers' rival talk show steals Peabody and Sherman's audience. Clumsy mountaineering maven Lucy Walker makes history on the Matterhorn.

imdb.plot outline: With Mr. Peabody and Sherman's WABAC time machine now public knowledge, the genius dog decides there is only one thing to be done: put on a TV talk show. So, now Peabody and Sherman host just such a program from their penthouse apartment which recounts their improbably time traveling adventures. In addition, the duo also have various guests from the past, when they are not interrupted by their building neighbors or landlord.
imdb.title: The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show
plot: The world's smartest dog and his boy host a TV talk show.::Kenneth Chisholm

With Mr. Peabody and Sherman's WABAC time machine now public knowledge, the genius dog decides there is only one thing to be done: put on a TV talk show. So, now Peabody and Sherman host just such a program from their penthouse apartment which recounts their improbably time traveling adventures. In addition, the duo also have various guests from the past, when they are not interrupted by their building neighbors or landlord.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)
